description: Retailers warn more jobs and businesses are at risk as non-essential shops are forced to close.
title: 'Stop-start' Covid rules cost shops £2bn a week, says industry
title_page: 'Stop-start' Covid rules cost shops £2bn a week, says industry - BBC News
maintext: "We expect that customers will take the rest of the weekend to figure out what this means for their festive plans and it will be next week before we see any impact," it said.
